    • About Jan Leasure


    Jan Leasure has done it all. You may know her as your former teacher (Jack Benny Junior High School, Waukegan), as your college instructor (Columbia College), as a journalist (contributing editor to Mortgage Broker Magazine, Mortgage Originator Magazine, or the money-saving $uper $aver), or as your mortgage banker. She entered the field of mortgage banking in 1996 because it gave her the opportunity to do several things she loves: help others, teach, and solve problems. Jan accepted her current position as Division President of Diamond Residential Mortgage, Libertyville for three reasons: Their commitment to personalized customer service, their determination to ensuring that all loans close with integrity, and the great support and positive attitude that the company emanates through every employee.

    Jan Leasure
    Diamond Residential Mortgage
